We stayed in the Spa Suites at Chateau Elan and it was a dream from start to finish
What I mean is that the room was ok
Housekeeping cleaned our room quickly and efficiently
The bathroom was lovely with a great bath and shower although no bath sheets even just normal towels and very basic soaps etc

I asked for management and for her to be put out the hotel she was escorted downstairs just for her to be brought right back to her room where she had a greats night rest right in the room next to us for the entire night
2: The room was clean and ok just not as special as I was expecting rickety ironing board chintzy coffee maker toilet rocked
The bathroom in our room was missing the wall plate to cover the outlet and the soap tray in the shower was coming out of the wall tile
ill start with the reservation process because of the holiday weekend there were nt many openings however the agent found that their were some cancellations ans was able to find us a room

Anyway I call first thing Monday morning and they file a report to have someone go to the room and retrieve it
